|manuf=Cellvision |manuf_model=CAS-330W |manuf_rev=B2 |availability= |type=IP camera |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R2880 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160BBTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5640L16-7TC |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, (19200,8,N,1),, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, 5-pin header,, JP1 |wi1_module=Cellvision GLM-100 |wi1_module_if=PCI (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2560 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2525 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:03:1B |oui_eth=00:03:1B }} {{TagLine|Wireless G Network Camera}} "CAS-330W", "REV-B2", and PCB manuf. text (date code is '''0530''' - July 2005) is silkscreened on the top of the main board. "EPCS330ZA020", "MADE IN TAIWAN", and "CAS330WM2B2" is silkscreened on the bottom. :"EPWLGMR1X010" and some additional text (date code is '''0540''' - October 2005) is silkscreened on the wireless module (presumed model is '''GLM-100''' - it's on a label [along w/ the region and MAC] affixed to the RF shield). :All radial capacitors on the board are '''Canicon''' branded. The LDO voltage regulator is an '''AME''' AME1084ACDT (AME1084, ACDT, 0530). :A '''STMicroelectronics''' STV0676 CMOS sensor co-processor is on the main board. :"MADE IN TAIWAN" and "EP-CS390000CA"<...> is silkscreened on the back (visible portion without further disassembly) of the sensor board. ==Images== File:Hawking_HNC320G_unit_top.jpg|unit top File:Hawking_HNC320G_unit_bottom.jpg|unit bottom File:Hawking_HNC320G_unit_label.jpg|unit label {{#set:Has images=external|Has images=label}} File:Hawking_HNC320G_board_top_w_wi_module.jpg|board top, in case, w/ wireless module File:Hawking_HNC320G_board_top.jpg|board top File:Hawking_HNC320G_RDC_R2880.jpg|R2880 RISC SoC File:Hawking_HNC320G_RAM.jpg|RAM File:Hawking_HNC320G_RTL8201CP_FE_PHY.jpg|RTL8201CP PHY File:Hawking_HNC320G_angled_view_power_1.jpg|angled view near power section File:Hawking_HNC320G_Cellvision_text3.jpg|Cellvision board text File:Hawking_HNC320G_board_bot.jpg|board bottom File:Hawking_HNC320G_Flash_and_headers_underside.jpg|Flash + underside of the two headers File:Hawking_HNC320G_Cellvision_label.jpg|Cellvision label File:Hawking_HNC320G_Cellvision_text1.jpg|Cellvision board text File:Hawking_HNC320G_Cellvision_text2.jpg|Cellvision board text File:Hawking_HNC320G_partial_camera_side.jpg|partial view of camera side, 1 File:Hawking_HNC320G_partial_camera_side_2.jpg|partial view of camera side, 2 File:Hawking_HNC320G_partial_camera_side_under.jpg|partial view of camera side, underside File:Hawking_HNC320G_wireless_module_unshielded.jpg|wireless module, shield removed File:Hawking_HNC320G_wireless_module_underside.jpg|wireless module, underside {{#set:Has images=internal}} ==Serial== ===Boot log=== 
RS.....[MAC: 00 03 1B 56 4F 31][MAC: 00 03 1B 5A 05 13][Random: 00 8D][system ready.....]
